events.title: Seven victims of plateau attacks get mass burial
events.description:
Seven victims of recent attacks in plateau state were given a mass burial in bassa lga as community leaders demand justice and an end to the violence.

read more: https://punchng.com/seven-victims-of-plateau-attacks-get-mass-burial/
